name: Shu-Han (Alvin) Wang
title: Senior Front-End Engineer
about: Front-End Engineer specializing in React, React Native, and Next.js, with a strong track record in delivering secure and scalable FinTech solutions. Experienced in leading cross-functional teams, mentoring junior developers, and promoting best practices in CI/CD, testing, and architectural design. Passionate about collaboration, code quality, and continuous learning in both tech and life.

experience.title: LINE Bank – Senior Front-End Development Manager
details: Leading development of secure FinTech applications using React, Next.js, Redux (Saga), Styled-Components, and Webpack.
Ensured high code quality through Vitest, Jest, React Testing Library, and redux-saga-test-plan.
Owned and maintained the LINE Bank enterprise website.
Acted as task force leader, collaborating with designers, PMs, and cross-functional teams, and mentoring junior engineers.
Worked closely with LINE Taiwan and Korea to deliver localized banking services.

experience.title: LINE Bank – Front-End Development Manager
details: Developed core banking features (deposit, transfer, debit card, insurance) with React, Hooks, Redux (Saga), and Webpack.
Integrated Firebase for behavior tracking and analytics.
Mentored junior developers and drove architectural improvements in the web team.
Collaborated cross-regionally with LINE Taiwan and Korea.

experience.title: TripPlus – Front-End & React Native Engineer
details: TripPlus iOS App: Built and maintained app with React Native, Redux Thunk, OneSignal, PubNub, and Fastlane.
Implemented article sharing/editing, credit card search, flight search, chatbot, and push notification.
TripPlus Web: Built web platform using React, Redux Thunk, Draft.js.
Delivered features like article management, mileage storefront, and credit card comparison.
Focused on RWD, performance, and brand-aligned UI/UX.

experience.title: Mitake – Software Engineer
details: Developed real-time stock trading platform using React, Redux-Saga, and WebSocket.
Built behavior tracking dashboards and HR systems using React, Nginx, Bootstrap.
Created Windows 10 UWP stock market app with C#, XAML, integrating custom socket protocols.

experience.title: Acer Inc. – Senior Project Engineer
details: Led Android projects including intelligent agents and location engines using Java.
Developed Windows Store apps (Acer Cloud Music, MemoryBinder) with C#, C++.
Built desktop analytics and auto-test tools with C++, C#, ADK, WPF.
Participated in Scrum process and delivered across global product lines.

projects.name: LINE Bank Enterprise
projects.desc: Owned and maintained the enterprise banking site. Led front-end architecture, collaborated with designers / PMs / cross-functional teams.

projects.name: LINE Bank
projects.desc: Core development member of LINE Bank, delivering secure FinTech applications. Focused on React, Redux (Saga), Styled-Components, and Webpack.

projects.name: TripPlus
projects.desc: Web platform with article management, mileage storefront, and credit card comparison. RWD, performance, and brand UI/UX focused.

projects.name: Mitake Stock Trading Platform
projects.desc: Real-time web trading system and Windows UWP stock market app.

education.degree: Master’s Degree in Computer Science & Communication, 2009–2011
education.desc: Thesis: Performance analysis of transmit diversity scheme based on relay-grouping for broadband cooperative communication.
